name: AnchoredObjectSetting
shortdesc: The settings for an anchored object.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the AnchoredObjectSetting &#40;a Application, Document, EPSText, SplineItem, Polygon, GraphicLine, Rectangle, Oval, Group, TextFrame, Button, FormField, SignatureField, TextBox, RadioButton, ListBox, ComboBox, CheckBox, MultiStateObject or ObjectStyle).

property.name: anchoredPosition
property.shortdesc: The position of the anchored object relative to the anchor.

property.name: spineRelative
property.shortdesc: If true, the position of the anchored object is relative to the binding spine of the page or spread.

property.name: lockPosition
property.shortdesc: If true, prevents manual positioning of the anchored object.

property.name: pinPosition
property.shortdesc: If true, pins the position of the anchored object within the text frame top and bottom.

property.name: anchorPoint
property.shortdesc: The point in the anchored object to position.

property.name: horizontalAlignment
property.shortdesc: When anchored position is above line, the position of the anchored object is relative to the text area. When anchored position is custom, the horizontal alignment of the anchored object is set by the horizontal reference point. Note: Not valid when anchored position is inline.

property.name: horizontalReferencePoint
property.shortdesc: The horizontal reference point on the page. Valid only when anchored position is custom.

property.name: verticalAlignment
property.shortdesc: The vertical alignment of the anchored object reference point with the vertical reference point on the page. Notes: Valid only when anchored position is custom.

property.name: verticalReferencePoint
property.shortdesc: The vertical reference point on the page. Valid when anchored position is custom.

property.name: anchorXoffset
property.shortdesc: The horizontal &#40;x) offset of the anchored object.

property.name: anchorYoffset
property.shortdesc: The vertical &#40;y) offset of the anchored object. Corresponds to the space after property for above line positioning.

property.name: anchorSpaceAbove
property.shortdesc: The space above an above-line anchored object.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: insertAnchoredObject
method.shortdesc: Inserts the anchored object into specified story.

parameter.name: storyOffset
parameter.shortdesc: The location within the story, specified as an insertion point.

parameter.name: anchoredPosition
parameter.shortdesc: The position of the anchored object relative to the anchor. &#40;Optional)

method.name: releaseAnchoredObject
method.shortdesc: Releases the anchored object from its associated text.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the AnchoredObjectSetting.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
